description: [ZIPLINE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1114) can identify a specific string in intercepted network traffic, `SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_0.3xx.`, to trigger its command functionality.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge January 2024)

external_references.description: McLellan, T. et al. (2024, January 12). Cutting Edge: Suspected APT Targets Ivanti Connect Secure VPN in New Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
